Well, I think I am more worried about the management politics.
I can picture the time that the manager come to me just because
I don't have as much asserts as others.  If that happens, my
life would be miserable because I have to pay attention on
something political.

'Least politics' is one of the reasons that I like about XP.  Programming,
and
programming only.  People recognize someone because of his programming
skill, refactoring skill and definitely mentoring skill, not how many
asserts he has in his code.


kentbeck@... wrote:

> Are folks worried about accidentally leaving asserts out of methods,
> or about evil programmers boosting their test count by writing bogus
> tests?
>
> Kent
